tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hair_style VARCHAR(50),
    hair_color VARCHAR(50),
    skin_color VARCHAR(50),
    clothing_style VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50),
  character_color VARCHAR(20),
  character_outfit VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE character_customization (
  customization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customization_type VARCHAR(50),
  customization_value VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE player_customization (
  player_id INT,
  customization_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_preferences(player_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customization_id) REFERENCES character_customization(customization_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CharacterCustomizations (
   customization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   player_id INT,
   hairstyle VARCHAR(50),
   facial_hair VARCHAR(50),
   tattoo VARCHAR(50),
   FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES PlayerPreferences(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CharacterOutfits (
   outfit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   player_id INT,
   outfit_name VARCHAR(50),
   armor_level INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES PlayerPreferences(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CharacterBackgrounds (
   background_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   player_id INT,
   background_type VARCHAR(50),
   background_image_url VARCHAR(255),
   FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES PlayerPreferences(player_id)
);
